website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you prefer a lighter duvet. Otherwise, we recommend the Utopia Bedding as a more cost-effective top pick.
pros: Microfiber fill is soft and hypoallergenic
cons: The material feels somewhat flimsy compared to the Casa Andrea Milano which is also down alternative

customer_reviews.title: Disingenuous marketing/description -  Washable, but not really.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this, as it was marketed as washable. However, when I got it, the care instructions almost immediately recommend against washing at home (see pic). I have a newish, front-loading washer and dryer, and they could probably handle the blanket. But I just don't like when companies are shady. Sounds like this blanket is machine washable the same way a cashmere sweater is machine washable---You can do it if you want, but you really, really shouldn't.
customer_reviews.author: PeppersGhost

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy fluff
customer_reviews.text: It's so fluffy! As soon as I got it I threw it in the dryer with some dryer sheets and when it came out it was fluffier than before. I threw it on my bed and my dog immediately jumped up on it and hasn't left since. He enjoys it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect weight for the summer months
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is amazing! I was getting too warm with my down comforter but still wanted something soft, and this was the answer. It's very light, yet still provides enough warmth that I'm only using this with a flat sheet. It fit perfectly in my duvet cover and comes with loops on each corner and midway between the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Joiseygirl

customer_reviews.title: Double disappointments: it's not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: While I enjoy other products from Linenspa, I'm terribly disappointed with this comforter, not because of its usage but its durability to washing machines. The first one tear at the first time I washed it, tears started to appear and wool spilled out from them. I thought I was just unlucky, so I returned it and order a new one. The second one also experienced the exact same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Don Tawanpitak

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: At first, this blanket was great. It's super comfortable, super soft, and literally perfect. Stays cool, not scratchy or anything. But for some reason one side of the blanket sucks after 2 weeks of use. It's scratchy, and the cotton is coming out of the blanket. Would not reccomend this at all. And because it's "broken" I believe I now can not return it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Reinke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible comforter. I have had it for a few months and washed it for the second time on a low setting. When I opened up the washing machine, the comforter was full of holes and a lot of stuffing was coming out. I'm very disappointed. There is something inside the comforter that came out and dyed it black. The washing machine had been recently cleaned so I'm not sure what it is. Up until then it was very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue/grey combo has a lot of problems.
customer_reviews.text: Gray side is comfortable and cool but the blue side feels rough and cheap. 3 nights of use and small strands of the filling are poking out through the fabric. In some cases there are balls of the filling coming out from holes in the fabric that. It looks like a pet bed blanket on the blue side with small fibers all over. I just wish the blue side was like the grey side then it would have gotten a 4 or a 5 star. I washed it once on cold/delicate and hung out side to dry the first hour I had it due to a really strong petroleum like smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love it! It's soft, and keeps me warm. I will definitely be ordering BOTH other colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not machine washable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Airbnb where I expect to do a lot of laundry. The description says it is machine washable, but when it arrived, the packaging says not to stick it in the machine. Of course, the first time I washed it, it balled up and is now lumpy and not usable for my Airbnb. Not happy. Not as described.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time....light weight yet does the job for comfort and warmth...would buy again....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat this deal!
customer_reviews.text: It feels like a cloud! I'm in love! Super soft and it looks like it will last me forever! (The picture has a cover, but it's to give you a general idea of how big and nice)
customer_reviews.author: Gina Fowlkes

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and holds up well in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a week ago already ripping up I don't recommend this comforter
customer_reviews.author: Austin Farland

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could write a 5 star review like the thousands of other people that purchased this. First off this comforter is NOT an all season comforter, I cannot count the countless times I’ve woken up sweating to death and kicking this blanket off of me. Waste of money. Not ideal for the summer at all. Did not fluff up either. Get dirty super quick.
customer_reviews.author: Brennon

customer_reviews.title: Umm...why didn't I get what the other thousand positive review people get??
customer_reviews.text: Ok I normally love linenspa and only bought this because of the gazillion great reviews. I received it TODAY and threw it in the dryer with a couple dryer sheets (tumble low as directed) to refresh it before putting it on my bed. As soon as I pull it out, I noticed the "down alternative" was coming out in multiple places. This was on tumble low...what if I would have washed it?? I'm not sure what all those other thousands of people got but I got this (see pic below). It's going back and If I were you, I would add some more coinz and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: dexter

customer_reviews.title: i live in texas so i didn't want anything super think. would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: was exactly what i was looking for....i live in texas so i didn't want anything super think. would definitely buy again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: moolafey

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up in wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved this comforter was not too heavy and felt so soft even inside our duvet cover. However, I needed to wash this insert in our washer and the material DID NOT hold up. I was thrilled when I read this was supposed to be machine washable. I have ripped fabric at the bottom of my insert and I do not think it can be patched. Now I have to replace. Please do not get this unless you plan to dry clean or have another means of washing it. Loved it other than that :(
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: An “alternative” to Down, not Down Alternative
customer_reviews.text: It’s an “alternative to down,” but definitely NOT down alternative. It’s just a cheap white duvet insert. It cannot not be used without a duvet cover, as discribed... well, I guess it could, it would go well with those 2 for $10 pillows (as long as you did put pillow cases on them). I won’t be able to use it. It makes my duvet look like a cheap comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Pounds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great comforter! Light weight yet definitely warm enough for northern winters!
customer_reviews.author: R. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it, nice and soft and fluffier than other o had ordered. I ordered. Full to put on a two. So it would hang a bit.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Sooo soft and fluffy like a cloud, and hot like a Heat Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I was torn on how to rate this one, 1 start didn't seem fair because it really is soft and fluffy and cuddly, however if you are a hot sleeper, this comforter probably wont be for you, I now know what the french fries feel like as they sit under those heat lamps keeping them hot. It was crazy, for that I would not all it all season at all. It also did not have much weight to it, I expected to be semi heavy but not light as a feather. I wanted it to be "The One" based on reviews but it just wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: merlin696

customer_reviews.title: I was not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with this purchase. It’s polyester, so it’s very hot (which, to be fair I did not pay much attention to the material), and it ripped the first time i attempted to wash it. It was really a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Pilling BAD
customer_reviews.text: I was super upset as this blanket starting pilling after only having for one month. There are now little balls all over it. This happened before the first wash and it’s only gotten worse since washing it per the directions on the care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Bad seam, careful of washing..
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, after one wash, part of an edging seam came undone and too frayed to restitch without looking silly. The down replacement also became "bunchy," and required a lot of shaking out. With a duvet cover, it looks a bit higher quality and will help sustain the comforter, itself. I purchased one of the color versions, as opposed to plain white, as I wanted the option of no duvet... This product really needed one, anyway. So, I may have been better off with the plain, less expensive white. As a whole, this is a decent, temperature-versatile comforter. It just isn't quite as durable as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Vines

customer_reviews.title: Very well made for the price, impressed with the loops all around.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the price. I actually wanted something that's a little flatter and less puffy than my down duvet (which is super comfortable but makes the bed look puffy because it doesn't lay too flat). I put this on over top to weigh it down and it looks a bit more smooth than the feather one (the feather is underneath the one showing in the picture). I do like how there are loops all around the duvet (and gosh I wish my pottery barn duvet cover had ties all around that would be spiffy but nope only in the corners) Pretty happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Angela_GTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great duvet, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great duvet, good quality, warm, and easy to add a duvet cover (includes corner ties). I paired this with a custom duvet cover from Redbubble ("The God Source" by Salviadroid). Looks ABSOLUTELY FANTASTIC and very warm! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: BigSilverHotdog

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not so good a deal as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comforter for my daughter for her birthday and she really liked the softness of the fabric plus it seemed light weight. The problem is that after 5 months both sides of the comforter are pilling horribly. Way more than I would have expected. She decided she wanted another cover for her bed and I have been using it as a throw in the afternoon and the pills are very apparent, plus unsightly. This makes the feel of the fabric against my skin unpleasant. I also bought as washable and the instructions say it's highly recommended to be professionally laundered. A little disingenuous.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Short and Itchy
customer_reviews.text: This cover seemed like a great deal at first, but once I took it out of the packing (vacuum sealed bag) and laid it over my king size bed it barely fit over the sides of the mattress. I don’t know about you but I like some material hanging over the edge of the mattress. Then within a matter of minutes my hands became extremely itchy and red. Apparently there’s some chemical they add to the comforter or packing process that I had an allergic reaction too. I’m returning this comforter right away.
customer_reviews.author: instintiva

customer_reviews.title: If I save you, I'll feel better
customer_reviews.text: When this comforter first arrived, I loved is softness and gentle warmth. Within just a few months however, massive amounts of lint pills started to form. These pills destroyed the comfortable feeling of the material and now makes it feel like sandpaper. I used a lint razor to remove all of the pills which was a 2 hour process. Within a few weeks, the pills returned worse than ever. I'm so mad that I'm writing this review almost 2 years since I made the purchased. Highly disappointed. Find something different.
customer_reviews.author: Boatpeople

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but Too Hot for Me
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4stars because it is WAY too hot ... I bought down alternative because they tend to not overheat you the way down duvets will, but this was just as hot as real down. Which ... may be a POSITIVE thing for folks who want the crazy warmth of down but are allergic to it. The price is amazing, no doubt ... and it’s comfy. Needs a cover. And is TOO HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: I don't typically rate things poorly but...
customer_reviews.text: First time I put it in the washer and dryer, cotton balls began to seep out of it. Hard to explain but it looked like a bunch of lint was on it initially, then I started to try and take the lint off but I realized that the cotton on the inside of the duvet was coming out of the duvet micro holes. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kenn M Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent comforter for the money. My husband bought our mattress from LinenSpa and decided to pair it with the comforter. It's breathable but still keeps us warm. The only reason I knocked off a star was that the washing instructions say to have it professionally laundered in order to avoid the inner material from clumping and bunching inside the comforter. I wash my comforter every 2 weeks to a month and don't see professional cleaning as a very cost effective method, so I will probably take my chances and wash it myself, but for the price, it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Harris

customer_reviews.title: WOOF!
customer_reviews.text: This is not even close to "down alternative" as it doesn't pass for anything close to down-like in weight or feel and the covering is a cheap, thing synthetic. Woof. No wonder it's so cheap. The down-alternative comforter I got from Target several years ago was much higher quality and covered in a high-quality cotton percale like a real down comforter and it was only $15 more. Really, spend a bit more for way higher quality. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DogGeek

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and a weird shape
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is very warm and does not breath well. I an always cold. In my lab I keep an electric heater pointed on me at all times. This blanket is too warm for me. I cant stand it. I have had real down blankets that are very good to use, but this thing traps in heat, doesn't breath at all and you suffocate. Imagine a blanket with saran wrap on the bottom. It just seals in heat. I would not recommend this for anyone who isn't a ski bum sleeping in the car at the base of Keystone in the middle of winter.
customer_reviews.author: ChemNerd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect winter comforter. Not for year round use.
customer_reviews.text: This duvet or comforter is great. I’m always freezing, but this thing is WAY too hot for anything other than winter. A bit confused by those who reviewed and said it was perfect for all weather. I assure you this is not good for all weather. Disappointed I can’t use it year round, but you can’t beat the price .
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Not all season... VERY hot!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is NOT all season. I have never been the type of person who sweats at night. I always run cold. This blanket is like a sauna! I'm dripping sweat in bed, so bad it's almost like I'm sick! Ive not had a fever... it's just the blanket. It IS lightweight, so I'm not sure how it's so hot. I wound up pulling out my old comforter so I can sleep comfortably. Pros: Very soft. Seems like it's good quality. Will be great for winter, or on nights when my husband has the AC too high.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Warm blanket
customer_reviews.text: This thing is thin but man is it warm! I bought this to go inside of a duvet. It doesn't exactly give the duvet a fluffy appearance, but it does keep me warm at night. I also love it for the ability to use it in both the summer and winter months without having to change it out because it is too heavy. I would recommend this if you're just looking for something functional to keep you warm. If you're looking for something that is going to look really fluffy, I'd order something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Light/Very Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This looked like my old comforter so I took the leap. What arrived was anything but. This is extremely cheap. The outside material is like a magnet for every fuzz, hair, lint, microscopic floating anything. This thing gets dirty just looking at it. I've taken lint rollers, duct tape, etc to try and get it looking white again....NOT HAPPENING. If you lay on this with a pink sweater on, it'll have pink fuzzies all over it. It's also not very warm. It's June. If I use this I have to put another blanket under it to even stay warm. The inside materials must be "extra breathable" because it lets in a draft from every direction.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Comfy good size but after washing can’t use
customer_reviews.text: I loved this comforter until....I washed it! One edge is all ripped and insides all came out it looks like crap and now I can’t use it or return it kind of sad. It’s a little heavier which I like and it was comfy and fit perfect on my bed but now Im just out of money and luck with it. I need a new comforter and I can’t return this one because last day to return was yesterday!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Scheid

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping in the Clouds
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable comforter I've ever owned. It is fluffy and cozy. It washes great. I just washed it on cold and dried it on low. It came out perfect. I have an oversized King and this one fits nicely. I'd prefer just a smidge more blanket but I'm a blanket hog so that's my own issue. It's color is true. Exactly what you see in the picture is what comes to your door. It's VERY warm so we got rid of all our other blankets and just use this one comforter with a flat sheet. It makes doing the wash that less difficult. I think everyone should own a down comforter. Buy it! I'm a fan for life.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Light, Airy, Soft, Warm, Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Soft, fluffy, and light weight. I got three of these in the twin size for my kids. This blanket keeps them warm but not overly. And it's light so it doesn't smoother them or restrict them from moving around. We put them in cotton duvet covers. So airy and cozy like clouds or marshmallows. My kids love their blankets. I've washed and dried them in the laundry machine and dryer. The twin size fit well in my top load washer. Came out beautifully. No bunching of the stuffing. In fact, I think they got fluffier. Wonderful blankets for the price. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MemlyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Burned up in the dryer & could have caused a fire
customer_reviews.text: As a comforter it works ok - so long as you never try to clean it. When it came time to wash this comforter, I followed the instructions (machine wash cold / tumble dry low) and the comforter burned up and melted in the dryer. This could have caused a fire in my home! I am asking for a refund because the comforter is now ruined - not mention a fire hazard. (I have photos, but there is no option to add them to my review. WTH?)
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Kinda thin but super soft.
customer_reviews.text: It's not as fluffy as some of the other down alternative comforters I've had BUT that doesn't stop it from being super soft. I thought, with it being kinda thin, that it wouldn't be as warm but I was wrong. It retains heat well I think, but not so much that someone who gets hot at night like I do, is bothered by it. The material is realllly soft, too!! Overall, I really like it. It's just not going to be REALLY fluffy, so if that doesn't bother you, then definitely get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: 🛌Soft, Lush and Breathable🌬
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Blue/Grey comforter in a Oversized Queen size and I must say. This thing is light and comfortable to sleep in. My main goal was to find something that would be cold-ish, breathable and would help my body dissipate heat. Well this did the trick. I love it! Pros➕ -Cold ❄️ & warm (not sure how to explain that) -Smooth -Won’t stick you body -Dissipates body heat -Oversized Queen cheaper than Queen Cons➖ -Durability? Maybe.. will update after a couple washes
customer_reviews.author: Fazz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Our comforter suddenly bit the dust and I happened upon this one right away. I had chosen it because the price seemed fair and the reviews were good. It washes very well I used hot water the first time through... because Covid-19... Now that we have slept on it for a while, it is lightweight yet keeps you warm. My husband actually said he thought it wasn't going to be warm enough because it was so lightweight... but he was pleasantly surprised. And it has good cushion too! This fits well on a queen sized bed with a good amount of over hang.
customer_reviews.author: SarahLou

customer_reviews.title: Not breathable in any way
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how anyone can say this is breathable. My husband and I were so sweltering hot every time we used this and that’s even when it was 40 degrees! This was unfortunately a big nope. I guess because since it’s synthetic fibers inside, much like stuffing from a couch, it’s very dense and air can’t really pass. The positives of it though I will say were that it is very light weight so I didn’t feel like I was being crushed like other comforters and it is very very soft which I did like. Honestly, it’s sad. If it weren’t so gosh darn hot it would be a fine comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Pink Neko

customer_reviews.title: A great comforter for those cold nights
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is the key feature of this comforter. It's not real thick and fluffy but keeps you warm. It is poorly made and sometimes the cotton insert comes through a small hole in the comforter. It's also reversible. I plan to use it this winter and probably will replace it with a name brand comforter in the spring. Bottom line: Spend a few more bucks to get a quality comforter made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Walt Guimbellot

customer_reviews.title: i would have spent double on this
customer_reviews.text: i’m not gonna lie - i got this as a cheap comforter alternative for my spare bedroom and i liked it so much it’s now in my bedroom... so i guess i have to buy another one lol this exceeded my expectations and it fluffy and light weight. i’m actually surprised that i love it so much considering i’ve had my heart set on a weighted blanket for a while now. this is for sure worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsie

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like it just came off the boat, stored in a cargo container at sea. Other than that, this comforter exceeded all expectations. You are going to have to hang it outside for a day, then the smell will disappear. It’s not “in” the material, rather on the surface. Smelled like it was shipped and stored just probably how it was...in an industrial warehouse somewhere and then put on a cargo container and shipped across the ocean. Just don’t freak out and think it’s bad. Seriously, just hang it outside and it will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Geargeek

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed to be a good choice based off photos and the description. Unfortunately the lighter color side (Light Grey side) began pilling almost right away. Furthermore, I have never washed this comforter in fear that it wold get worse or fall apart completely. The fabric is not soft and seems to be made of cheap materials. Overall very disappointed in the quality and how fast the light side began pilling.
customer_reviews.author: robert blum

customer_reviews.title: This is a great comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these comforters, they are awesome! They are big and fluffy and you can't beat the price. I would highly recommend this comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warner

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter ever. So I bought two.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST comforter I’ve ever purchased. My pictures don’t do it justice. I originally purchased it to put inside a duvet cover but the material, the color and the plush feel of it all combined make this comforter a stand alone stylish comforter as it is. It is so extremely cozy amd silky soft! It will keep you warm though. Might want to turn the heat down if you’re a cooler sleeper or have a lightweight blanket underneath so you can peel this one back and carry-on with your sleep. For the price, you cannot beat the quality of this comforter. It is super posh and ultra plush.
customer_reviews.author: GreenvilleMom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold up
customer_reviews.text: Had this item for just over a year. The seam stitching started to unravel. Also, it claims to be washable, so we washed it in our large capacity washer and dryer that doesn’t have a center mounted agitator. The first time we washed it, little lint balls started showing up and it only got worse with time. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's reversible. It's nice and thick and the color is perfect. I bought this a year ago (in 2017) and i'm just now writing a review. I have a cat and he sheds sometimes and the fur just wipes right off this comforter. I've washed this half a dozen times (only because I'm spill-prone) and it's holding up perfectly. I would definitely recommend, it's a great price for something with such good durability and thickness.
customer_reviews.author: TFBenitez

customer_reviews.title: Best comforter money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best comforter we ever bought. We had goose dawn comforters but this surpasses in terms of comfort warmth and weight. My wife is very picky about bedding and she says this comforter is the quietest as she hears no sound from it which is important for her.
customer_reviews.author: Manchu

customer_reviews.title: Is it washable or not?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this comforter because it stated "machine washable" in the item description. Multiple places in the item description state it's machine washable. I received the comforter and it came with a care sheet that basically said the opposite. Care sheet instructed me to have the blanket professionally cleaned every 2-3 years and that I could wash it, but it would take 10-12 hrs to dry in the dryer and that it was not recommended. So which is it? Very misleading. If I didn't need the comforter right away, I would be returning it. grrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Knurse

customer_reviews.title: Great Material, Could be Bigger
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a full mattress. It's a correct size but a bit small for a top comforter. If I were going to do it again I'd get a queen size for a full mattress. As far as quality, it seems well made. It's a nice material but it's the kind of density that makes it versatile for a range of temperatures. Good fall-through-spring comforter. Happy with the purchase, but I'd rather it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: Zach B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly weighted for heavy and light duvet lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a lightweight but not too lightweight duvet - my boyfriend wants like...a single top sheet as his duvet, and I want to feel like I’m wrapped up in a warm hug, a la Olaf style. This is a great combination for both of us - we’re two nights in and both like it. I paired this with the Eikei Washed Cotton Chambray Duvet Cover (in Eucalyptus Mint), which I equally love - it’s so soft and looks like it belongs in a high end hotel! Pro tip: size up on the duvet! I got a king for our queen bed and am so glad I did - no more fighting over the edges! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Comforter
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours researching a hopefully cooler comforter, and saw that cotton is usually the best for breathable. I bought this thinking it was cotton filling (apparently another one of their comforters is) and this is microfiber. It's definitely cooler than the polyester filling I had before this, which made me sweat. This does make me run a little warm and will be amazing in the Autumn and I will keep using it for the rest of Summer. I do recommend this because it is lightweight, the look is nice and it's fluffy. I would recommend this, but if you sleep warm, this will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's fine, so I'm keeping it
customer_reviews.text: This is so snuggly, yet lightweight. It's so soft and 'lofty'. I wanted an alternative to down, since I'm vegan. I did order the white by mistake, when I mean to order the stone/gray color. But, it's fine, so I'm keeping it. I have two dogs that sleep on the bed with me and its held up nicely so far. I have yet to wash or dry it, but it seems to be made well, so I have no worries. I ordered the oversized king. It's SO hard to find a good sized king comforter or coverlet. Especially if you have a super thick mattress..they all seem to be too small....this is GENEROUSLY sized! I love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be washed/dried at home
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice, lightweight comforter; well made and keeps me warm. However, it didn't actually fit the full-size bed I have...too short if you turn it so it will cover the sides of the bed as shown in the photo. Guarantee suggests it be laundered every 2-3 years. That won't work in my home. People, cats, dogs...I launder my comforters every 2-3 months!
customer_reviews.author: DebbieB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great!!! It’s inexpensive & it does exactly what it’s intended to do. I bought a new comforter for this to go in & it is fluffy enough to make the comforter look good! It is lightweight... but it’s pretty warm!! We usually do not use it at night because I live in Destin & it can get a little warm. But, it’s perfect & im sure I’ll love it even more come fall & winter when it starts cooling down.
customer_reviews.author: Presley

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but this is a really poor quality. High reviews and initially for 1st 3 months comformter was great until it was washed 1-3 times and the seams came apart and the stuffing always got lumpy. It was affordable but I expected it to last at least 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: YoginiR

customer_reviews.title: Cook yourself in your own bed!
customer_reviews.text: HOT HOT HOT!!! This thing is hardly "All Season" it's been moderately cold (35-45) here recently and this thing does not breathe AT ALL. I woke up every single night of the week I used this comforter absolutely roasting. I kick the cover off and it's freezing in the house. Unless you run super cold all the time find another alternative.
customer_reviews.author: nkh004

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, washing ruins it
customer_reviews.text: It says that its machine washable but its not. When you do wash it, it ruins it. I had mine for 1 month and it split open in the washer and the color fades. The good news is it is the perfect size, gives plenty of room for 2 people in the bed even if the other person hogs the comforter. I would look elsewhere though for better comforter.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST comforter I've purchase in a very long time! It's lightweight so you don't get too warm where you sweat at night but warm enough where you stay the perfect amount of cuddly all night long. Its not tough or crinkly but instead wraps around you like a soft cloud of wonderfulness. I love this blanket so much. It also fits perfectly into pretty much every duvet cover I've tried it in which is great and I LOVE that it has the little loops that you can tie the covers to to prevent the blanket and cover from sliding everywhere. This seriously is the best. Get you one! Or five!
customer_reviews.author: Just Carol

customer_reviews.title: At first touch, immediately did not want.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I opened this item and felt the material I knew right away that it was not for me. The feel of it is very cheap and I like my blankets to be soft. This did not feel soft to the touch. I took a risk because the price is so low and this time it did not work out. Sending this back for sure. I can't speak to the warmth/comfort while sleeping bc I did not even take out of the plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: More of a Winter Comforter
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I don't have many complaints. However, it does run hot so I'd recommend that you use it in the winter and get a lighter one in the summer if you or your bed-partner runs hot. I've woken up a fair amount of times sweating and my boyfriend sweats more frequently than me. It's actually pretty light weight and not super thick, so it's impressive that it keeps the heat in so well! Looking forward to seeing how it holds up in the winter. Again, I'd buy it again for the price because it is quality and keeps you warm! But if you run hot or only want a summer one, I'd get something cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Harleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter if you never plan on washing it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for unfortunately before I could even use it I washed it exactly as the label indicated and when I went to put it in the dryer I noticed that it had bled the dye all over the white parts. Perhaps mine was defective I shall try to call Amazon tomorrow for assistance and will update review if things work out but as for now I am very disappointed in how much I spent on a comforter that's ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought and won't be the last. I LOVE this comforter. Like a cloud, warm without the weight and washes great without bunching.
customer_reviews.author: LoveComfortInCa.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase of a down alternative comforter and I love it!!!!! Very well made and exactly what I was looking for! For the price, you can't go wrong with this comforter... I bought a very pretty duvet cover that is bright with a flower print also for a great price to cover the comforter and looks very expensive but it was not! I tend to change temperatures a lot while sleeping. I'm either too cold or too hot and this comforter seems to adjust to my needs very well.. I am very happy I purchased this product and recommend buying it from this seller.. It came very nicely packaged and arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a guest bedroom set and as such needed something cheap that didn't look cheap. These things are great. They provide ample comfort, and look pretty classy. They definitely aren't as fluffy as down, but if you run it through a no heat setting in your drier with a couple of tennis balls, they do fluff up quite nicely. They are also perfectly sized in that they don't slide to the floor when you move around under them. There is just enough overhang on each side to cover the mattress without becoming cumbersome or heavy. I bought "grey" and the colors are great. No comlaints.
customer_reviews.author: Arianne

customer_reviews.title: Do not wash or Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: It was light and warm, so I enjoyed very much until today. After washing this first time, it was ripped all around, and had to go into the garbage bin. It only lasted for 3 months. I tried to contact to the manufacture, but AMAZON was not very helpful at all.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.text: After reading TONS of positive reviews about this garbage, I ordered it. What a HUGE mistake that was. Never again will I order from this brand. Super disappointed. I followed the directions on the tag. Washed it on delicate cycle with low spin. I wasn’t going to put it on my bed without washing. To me horror, it was ripped open when I took it out of the washer. I took it straight to the garbage. Got on Targets website and ordered one with Shipt.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A tip when ordering this item
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Light, reversible and comfortable. I ordered Cal King, thinking Cal King is 98" wide. I assumed it would hang over the side comfortably. It doesn't. Short on each side exposing bedding which looks tacky. I missed the return window so now I see the over size version. Measure your bed before you order to ensure draping on each side is acceptable. I'm screwed but you will enjoy the product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: My Achin Back

customer_reviews.title: Works well but warm
customer_reviews.text: I needed a non down comforter that would stand up to dogs. My dogs jump up in our bed so I needed material that was durable and did not attract hair. This does a decent job, but after washing twice I did notice a little pilling. The fill is good quality and evenly disbursed. I will say this is much warmer than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: So soft, light and fluffy even after washing 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of the linenspa comforter’s and I love them! I don’t care for bulky heavy comforter’s so when I got my first one I had to get more. So soft and light and fluffy and keeps me warm without waking me up in a pool of water. The designs are beautiful and I especially love that they are reversible so actually I guess I really have six comforters. You will need a large washer which I have and so far they have come out great even after drying them. Mine haven’t shrunk either. I have a queen size bed but I prefer the oversized king so it hangs to the floor on the side’s.
customer_reviews.author: Pynkrozez

customer_reviews.title: So pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this comforter! I wanted something to match a coastal cottage decor and it is beautiful and perfect. I have a queen size bed that sits high and am so happy I ordered the over-sized queen because it falls perfectly over the sides and gives plenty of room to fold back the top. The comforter is soft and oh so cozy. I like the pillow shams that came with it, but don’t expect them to be of the same quality as the comforter. They are thin, but coordinate perfectly. I use them in front of large thick pillow shams that I already had. I am expressly pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Son LOVES this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one for microfiber. It makes me hotter than I should be, but my teenage son loves microfiber. So, after reading a lot of reviews online, I chose this comforter for him. We received it next day. It comes packaged in a vacuum-sealed plastic. I washed it right out of the bag and when my son put it on his bed, he could not stop laying on it. He loves the double-sided option to coincide with what colored sheets he has on the bed. It has s small amount of fluffiness like an alternative down comforter, but with a softness of microfiber. It's a perfect comforter for teens!!!
customer_reviews.author: PharmDMom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely light weight. And flat as can be! There is no fluff! When I read the reviews it said it came flat but then raised as time went on. Yeah it comes flat because it’s vacuumed sealed but I even put this in the dryer and it’s still flat! It’s even more flatter/thinner than the plain comforter on had on there before. That’s not supposed to be a down alternate. It’s the only one with the size dimensions for my duvet comforter so I guess I am stuck with it. Otherwise I would be getting a real down comforter with some substance to it. Honestly they could of put some fluff to this thing! Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: lightweight but warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dad. He is elderly and gets cold easily. He also does not like anything very heavy covering him so it has been difficult to find something he likes. This worked out perfectly for him. I keeps him very warm but doesn't weigh much. He has a full size/double bed but I bought this in a twin size to keep the weight down. It covers the entire bed and even hangs over the edge some although it doesn't go down to the floor like in the picture. We got the brown one and the colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It works for now
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and not too hot but warm enough. I was hoping it would be bigger for my queen as to it’s doesnt look right being this short. I prefer it longer. So order a size up if you don’t like it short like this for a queen. Also there is a few spots with the filling coming out a little. I haven’t washed it yet so crossing my fingers that it won’t rip or something. The material is on the cheap side and I believe it should be a little cheaper then what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: TRASH!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how this comforter has good reviews; maybe customers were paid off or incentivized. Please don't purchase this item, you will be disappointed and return item. Quality is VERY poor, the comforter feels scratchy on the skin and you can tell made with inferior, cheap products. DOES NOT deserve more than 1 star at most, returned product and am waiting for a refund. VERY upset that Amazon would sell this crap and try and pass it off as a 4 star item. THIS IS NOT A LUXURY COMFORTOR it felt like some Chinese dollar store quality poly garbage. Other customers have said they got bed bugs from comfortor.
customer_reviews.author: Charlee Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Mini Australian Shepherd approved!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I am surprised how nice this comforter is. I am just as content sleeping on top of the comforter as I am sleeping underneath it. The color description is accurate and true to the pictures being advertised. For a thin comforter it is warmer than it appears. The perfect amount of warmth IMO, as often times I'm kicking off the old comforter as its too hot (live in Florida). I don't know how durable this comforter is but it appears to be decently built. If it fails prematurely I'll update this review. If it holds up I'll be buying these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this duvet insert. Wanted to change out bedding and decided to go with a duvet as it's a bit colder where I live now. The insert is very fluffy and lightweight but quite warm. It's probably warmer than one would want if you like being cold at night but depends on how cool you keep your space. It adds a nice layer of softness and comfort to for that perfect "fluffy bed" look. It's honestly made it harder for me to get out of bed in the mornings! Also, this was an amazing price considering inserts of similar quality range $80-$120+ that I've found. Will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but traps heat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this duvet because it had amazing reviews that stated it was great for lightweight, keep you cool while still feeling like you're sleeping with a cloud on top of you. Perfect. That's what I wanted. Unfortunately, every night since I've started using it I've woken up drenched in sweat. It's definitely uncomfortable for me and I'm going to look into returning it if I can. I don't know if I got a dud or what, but it's been miserable. Other than that it's extremely soft and does feel lightweight, but it definitely does a good job at keeping in heat.
customer_reviews.author: LNC

customer_reviews.title: 5 GOLD STARS
customer_reviews.text: I received this comforter yesterday and slept with it for the first time last night and I absolutely love it. I love that it's a all season comforter, it's very good quality, extra soft, comfortable, and a not too heavy weighted blanket. Its a perfect in the medium lightweight. I love the color, the coastal Grey stripe feel to it, and it's an absolute dream to sleep in. It feels like sleeping in expensive hotel /resort when sleeping in it. I also love that its machine washable, decent priced, and I love how it's super soft and fluffy. I highly recommend this all season comforter.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like down! Cotton and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I might be the only person out there who hated this blanket... But this "down alternative" was like no down I've ever felt. This reminded me of my 90s era kids thin cotton comforters... Lumpy and not warm enough. It was promptly returned, and was really hard to get back in the package without a vacuum sealer too.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: While it is large and fits nicely on our king sized bed
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product less than one star I would. While it is large and fits nicely on our king sized bed, it has immediately started to pill and tear. No wonder this product was so inexpensive - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off by saying, right off the bat I was annoyed because it didn’t ship out until almost a month after it was supposed to, but I can let that go, it finally arrived and I was super excited! It was very soft and warm without being too hot. I Had this comforter on my bed for less than a week before the first hole randomly showed up. Annoying but I figured it will be fine and unnoticeable, but then it got worse. The thing is completely falling apart, and it wasn’t exactly a cheap comforter. I paid a lot of memory for an unusable blanket a month later.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Post

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous product I put this in my dryer on medium I started to smell something and it was burning. I looked at the directions and it said to heat on low but still medium heat should not have caused this, this is a fire hazard! Imagine if I wasn't in the house or somebody put it on high or God for bid ya cigarette or something hits this.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Schlamp

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for me and one for my daughter. These comforters are really comfortable and lightweight for summer use. Looking forward to see how well they keep use warm come winter time. They are good quality. My daughter usually throws off blankets and comforters every time she is sleeping. When I check on her while she sleeps, this comforter is on her. I do not like to be hot when I sleep and this comforter keeps me cool. This is a great product. P.S. mine came with two pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive blanket
customer_reviews.text: I was moving and didn't get my belongings so I needed an inexpensive comforter. I love down comforters but didn't want to spend the money for a real one since I knew my things were coming so I ordered this one as a temporary fix. It is alternative down and doesn't feel like down at all - but it kept me warm and did the trick. I will probably donate this one since I only used it a couple of weeks but that is only because of my personal preferences.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: This is the second comforter ordered. The first exceeded ever expectation and I was so thrilled, I got new second for my bed, this time a king. Well...I want to know who measured this. It is the same size as my queen sized. I have a large queen bed which is why I ordered a king. I wake to no covers because it slipped off the bed as it is too short. It's a decent spring/fall comforter for here in the South where it rarely gets too cold.
customer_reviews.author: hejiaoning

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Better then goose down...
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase! Let me start by saying I’ve spent the money on goose down comforters before but they are the loudestttt things everrr... It sounds like a plastic bag with ever move. However this comforter really is perfect. It’s lightweight, does not have an odd smell to it, nor is it to heavy! Highly recommend! I also always wash all my stuff and it held up perfectly, did not ruin stuffing, did not clump up, dried MUCH faster then any other comforter I’ve had, and fits in the normal sized washer and drier with extra room!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but thin shell...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Does the job quite well. But do be warned: the shell of this duvet is thin and will tear easily in a washer and/or dryer. We have sewn ours shut 4 times now. The only positive note from that is we were able to inspect the filler and we can tell that it is, in fact, what it claims to be... A good duvet that keep us comfy and warm, but is easily torn apart by cleaning. 3 Stars is all I can honestly give this item...
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Just got it tonight but it is way thinner than ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it tonight but it is way thinner than I expected for the price. For $90 I didn’t think I’d have to buy a second blanket just to be warmer. I’ve had down alternative comforters before and they’ve been cheaper and thicker than this. Positive is all the squares will most likely keep it from chunking up in the wash, but I haven’t experimented with that yet. Oh, and it’s way smaller than I expected. I have a platform bed with just a mattress (no boxspring) and it doesn’t even cover the sheets fully. The picture of it going to the ground is deceiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Odenthal

customer_reviews.title: ... you cut open the seal on the bag it's like it inflates and started bulging out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: When you first get it you might think "wow the is not very big" but as soon as you cut open the seal on the bag it's like it inflates and started bulging out of the bag, SO fun! I loved it! It was very comfy and the goose in the inside almost feels slimy that's how song it is. I would definitely recommend getting a duvet or a quilt to go over it. Perfect for summer time, not too heavy... You will need a duvet or quilt for winter though.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pilly and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is one of the worst I’ve ever had. It is not light weight and the “down alternative” material used is no where near a down comforter, and doesn’t imitate that material at all and is not soft or comfortable. On top of that, this comforter became extremely pilly (little balls of matieral all over) with every use and wash. I’ve had this comforter for less than 2 months and already need to get rid of it because the pillyness is so uncomfortable to sleep under.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe M.

customer_reviews.title: Oversized comforters
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these - one oversized king and one oversized queen. I only just got them so I can't speak to the durability or of how they stand up to washing, but I can at least say they are definitely oversized and go over the full bed and down to almost the ground on both the queen and the king. I was particularly in the market for the oversized feature, so I am happy. The quality is soft but I can tell that there is a good chance for seams to rip etc. But for the price, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andria

product_meta.title: Linenspa All-Season White Down Alternative Quilted Comforter - Corner Duvet Tabs - Hypoallergenic - Plush Microfiber Fill - Machine Washable - Duvet Insert or Stand-Alone Comforter - Queen
